publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2513# Dr Elaine Murray: No Smoking Day 2005—That the Parliament notes that No Smoking Day will take place on 9 March 2005; recognises that tobacco is the single greatest preventable cause of ill-health and premature death in Scotland, being responsible for more than one in every five deaths; acknowledges that cutting smoking rates in Scotland will reduce the high incidence of cancer and heart disease caused by smoking and passive smoking; believes that the proposed ban on smoking in public places will help reduce the number of smokers in Scotland, helping save lives and reducing the thousands of preventable and premature deaths, and congratulates the estimated 420,000 smokers up and down Scotland who are ready to make a fresh start and kick the habit on No Smoking Day 2005.

S2M-2513# No Smoking Day 2005 (lodged on 2 March 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Shiona Baird*, Michael McMahon*, Christine May*, Brian Adam*, Karen Whitefield*, Robert Brown*, Bristow Muldoon*, Eleanor Scott*, Cathie Craigie*, Bill Butler*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Sarah Boyack*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mark Ballard*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-2513# Dr Elaine Murray: No Smoking Day 2005—That the Parliament notes that No Smoking Day will take place on 9 March 2005; recognises that tobacco is the single greatest preventable cause of ill-health and premature death in Scotland, being responsible for more than one in every five deaths; acknowledges that cutting smoking rates in Scotland will reduce the high incidence of cancer and heart disease caused by smoking and passive smoking; believes that the proposed ban on smoking in public places will help reduce the number of smokers in Scotland, helping save lives and reducing the thousands of preventable and premature deaths, and congratulates the estimated 420,000 smokers up and down Scotland who are ready to make a fresh start and kick the habit on No Smoking Day 2005. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shiona Baird, Michael McMahon, Christine May, Brian Adam, Karen Whitefield, Robert Brown, Bristow Muldoon, Eleanor Scott, Cathie Craigie, Bill Butler, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Sarah Boyack, Tommy Sheridan, Mike Pringle, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mark Ballard, Marlyn Glen, Jackie Baillie*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2513 #No Smoking Day 2005 (lodged on 2 March 2005) Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-2513# No Smoking Day 2005 (lodged on 2 March 2005) Marilyn Livingstone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-2513 #No Smoking Day 2005 (lodged on 2 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2513# No Smoking Day 2005 (lodged on 2 March 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-2513# No Smoking Day 2005 (lodged on 2 March 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
